notes.text: sap.m.Menu: Implemented now as a standalone control
ColumnMenu: Implement Accessible Resize Option
sap.m.RangeSlider: Labels overlapping is prevented
sap.m.Input: Update suggestion popover to display 'hello' in lowercase
sap.m.Input: Add bottom margin to prevent label overlap
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: fixed focus on Planning Calendar Row
Input controls: announced text is now following the guidelines
We've now set the correct aria value within the Rename dialog box for the input area
sap.m.Switch: state information is announced correctly now
sap.m.IconTabBar: Changed logging from warning to info for duplicate keys
sap.m.MultiInput documentation update
sap.m.NotificationList: Focus correctly restored
sap.m.Tokenizer: adjust narrow mode on token invalidation
We now ensure that the correct download parameter is set while downloading uploaded items using the table's download functionality
sap.m.TabStrip items can be deleted from keyboard with delete button when they are rendered in overflow popover
sap.m Button: fix typo in the color parameter
sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
sap.m.PlanningCalendarRow: custom header row background on hover is correct now
We now ensure that the image inside a slide tile is adjusted based on the width of the tile
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: MonthPicker fits in width on 200% zoom
sap.m.Wizard: Extra speech output removed
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Documentation is now improved
We've now addressed the unidentical key value pairs issue with the UploaderHttpRequestMethod enum
sap.m.ObjectMarker: Icon is decorative when the control is not visible
sap.m.TextArea: Accessibility page improvements
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Disable navigation past max date
sap.m.Input, sap.m.ComboBoxBase: Links in value state error messages are now correct
We've now enabled the screen reader announcement for navigation and action tiles
DateRangeSelection: Valid selection of only one date
ListItemBase: List item actions
Demokit VariantManagement: Fix Header Levels
sap.m.MessageStrip: Aria attributes are now correctly updated when enableFormattedText:true is set
sap.m.MessageToast: Message positions logic is now updated
sap.m.Link: emptyIndicatorMode has correct color now
sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Decorative property added
sap.m.Menu: End content controls properly updated
sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokens are properly updated in the n-more list after delete
